Sentencas: The effect of coal ash on the electrochemical performance of solid oxide electrolyte-based carbon fuel cells (SO-CFCs) is investigated in this study.
Titulo: Effect of Ash Components on the Performance of Solid Oxide Electrolyte-Based Carbon Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The polarization and durability performance of SO-CFCs fueled by lignite char, ash-free char, and ash-added char were measured and compared from 1023 to 1123 K
Titulo: Effect of Ash Components on the Performance of Solid Oxide Electrolyte-Based Carbon Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The influence of five different coal ashes and six typical inorganic species was evaluated in SO-CFCs during short-term operation.
Titulo: Effect of Ash Components on the Performance of Solid Oxide Electrolyte-Based Carbon Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The anode morphologies were analyzed to clarify the cell degradation.
Titulo: Effect of Ash Components on the Performance of Solid Oxide Electrolyte-Based Carbon Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The results indicate that lignite char shows a higher initial cell performance but a lower stability than ash-free char in SO-CFC.
Titulo: Effect of Ash Components on the Performance of Solid Oxide Electrolyte-Based Carbon Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The higher initial cell performance is attributed to the superior CO2 gasification reactivity, while the lower stability is more likely caused by carbon and ash deposits.
Titulo: Effect of Ash Components on the Performance of Solid Oxide Electrolyte-Based Carbon Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The effect of coal ash on the cell performance is strongly dependent upon the ash composition.
Titulo: Effect of Ash Components on the Performance of Solid Oxide Electrolyte-Based Carbon Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Inorganic Ca, K, and Fe species in coal ash improve the initial cell performance by catalyzing char-CO2 gasification reactivity.
Titulo: Effect of Ash Components on the Performance of Solid Oxide Electrolyte-Based Carbon Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Inorganic S and Fe species in coal ash tend to react with anode Ni particles and form large aggregations on the anode surface, leading to anode deactivation.
Titulo: Effect of Ash Components on the Performance of Solid Oxide Electrolyte-Based Carbon Fuel Cells

Sentencas: In combination with inorganic Ca, Fe, and K, Si and AI compounds in ash could form irregular-shape deposits on the anode surface and clog up the anode pores.
Titulo: Effect of Ash Components on the Performance of Solid Oxide Electrolyte-Based Carbon Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The ash with a high content of SiO2 and Al2O3 (93.39 wt % in total) shows no adverse effect on the cell performance.
Titulo: Effect of Ash Components on the Performance of Solid Oxide Electrolyte-Based Carbon Fuel Cells

Sentencas: This study suggests that proper coal ash pretreatment should be conducted to improve the cell stability of coal-fueled SO-CFCs.
Titulo: Effect of Ash Components on the Performance of Solid Oxide Electrolyte-Based Carbon Fuel Cells
